description: CodeyInstance is the API for creating CodeyInstance instances.

may reject unrecognized values.

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: Spec defines the desired state of a CodeyCodeyInstance.

parameters.description: Parameters are the configurable fields of a CodeyInstance.

service.description: Service contains CodeyInstance DBaaS specific properties

disableRegistration.description: Disable or enable registration of new users.

majorVersion.description:
Version contains supported version of CodeyInstance.
Multiple versions are supported.

Size contains settings to control the sizing of a service.
